## About {#about}

Welcome to **TithiShop**! We are passionate about bringing you authentic Bengali ethnic foods made with traditional recipes passed down through generations. Our products are crafted with love, using the finest ingredients and time-honored methods to ensure you get the true taste of Bengal in every bite.

We specialize in homemade pickles, preserves, and other traditional Bengali delicacies that are perfect for adding flavor to your meals and connecting you to your cultural roots.

```{=html}
      <img src="images/product4.jpg" alt="Product Image 4" loading="lazy">

    <div class="slide slideshow-slide" style="display: none !important;">
      <img src="images/product5.jpg" alt="Product Image 5" loading="lazy">
    </div>
    
    <button class="slideshow-btn prev" onclick="window.tithiSlideshowChange(-1)">&#10094;</button>
    <button class="slideshow-btn next" onclick="window.tithiSlideshowChange(1)">&#10095;</button>
  </div>
  
  <div class="slideshow-dots">
    <span class="dot slideshow-dot active" onclick="window.tithiSlideshowGoTo(1)"></span>
    <span class="dot slideshow-dot" onclick="window.tithiSlideshowGoTo(2)"></span>
    <span class="dot slideshow-dot" onclick="window.tithiSlideshowGoTo(3)"></span>
    <span class="dot slideshow-dot" onclick="window.tithiSlideshowGoTo(4)"></span>
    <span class="dot slideshow-dot" onclick="window.tithiSlideshowGoTo(5)"></span>
  </div>
</div>

<script>
(function() {
  'use strict';
  
  let tithiSlideIndex = 0;
  let tithiAutoPlayInterval = null;
  let tithiSlides = [];
  let tithiDots = [];
  
  function tithiInitSlideshow() {
    // Hide all slides immediately
    tithiSlides = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.slideshow-slide'));
    tithiDots = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.slideshow-dot'));
    
    // Remove all active classes first
    tithiSlides.forEach(function(slide) {
      slide.classList.remove('slideshow-active');
      slide.style.display = 'none';
    });
    
    tithiDots.forEach(function(dot) {
      dot.classList.remove('active');
    });
    
    // Filter out slides with missing images
    tithiSlides = tithiSlides.filter(function(slide, index) {
      var img = slide.querySelector('img');
      if (img) {
        img.onerror = function() {
          slide.style.display = 'none';
          if (tithiDots[index]) {
            tithiDots[index].style.display = 'none';
          }
        };
        // Check if image loaded successfully
        if (img.complete && img.naturalHeight === 0) {
          slide.style.display = 'none';
          if (tithiDots[index]) {
            tithiDots[index].style.display = 'none';
          }
          return false;
        }
      }
      return true;
    });
    
    // Hide dots for missing slides
    tithiDots.forEach(function(dot, index) {
      if (!tithiSlides[index]) {
        dot.style.display = 'none';
      }
    });
  }
  
  function tithiShowSlide(n) {
    if (tithiSlides.length === 0) return;
    
    // Normalize index
    if (n >= tithiSlides.length) {
      tithiSlideIndex = 0;
    } else if (n < 0) {
      tithiSlideIndex = tithiSlides.length - 1;
    } else {
      tithiSlideIndex = n;
    }
    
    // Hide all slides
    tithiSlides.forEach(function(slide) {
      slide.classList.remove('slideshow-active');
      slide.style.display = 'none';
    });
    
    // Remove active from all dots
    tithiDots.forEach(function(dot) {
      dot.classList.remove('active');
    });
    
    // Show current slide
    if (tithiSlides[tithiSlideIndex]) {
      tithiSlides[tithiSlideIndex].classList.add('slideshow-active');
      tithiSlides[tithiSlideIndex].style.display = 'block';
      
      if (tithiDots[tithiSlideIndex]) {
        tithiDots[tithiSlideIndex].classList.add('active');
      }
    }
  }
  
  function tithiNextSlide() {
    tithiShowSlide(tithiSlideIndex + 1);
  }
  
  function tithiStartAutoPlay() {
    if (tithiAutoPlayInterval) {
      clearInterval(tithiAutoPlayInterval);
    }
    tithiAutoPlayInterval = setInterval(tithiNextSlide, 5000);
  }
  
  function tithiResetAutoPlay() {
    if (tithiAutoPlayInterval) {
      clearInterval(tithiAutoPlayInterval);
    }
    tithiStartAutoPlay();
  }
  
  // Global functions for onclick handlers
  window.tithiSlideshowChange = function(n) {
    if (n > 0) {
      tithiShowSlide(tithiSlideIndex + 1);
    } else {
      tithiShowSlide(tithiSlideIndex - 1);
    }
    tithiResetAutoPlay();
  };
  
  window.tithiSlideshowGoTo = function(n) {
    tithiShowSlide(n - 1);
    tithiResetAutoPlay();
  };
  
  // Initialize immediately
  function tithiInitialize() {
    tithiInitSlideshow();
    if (tithiSlides.length > 0) {
      tithiShowSlide(0);
      tithiStartAutoPlay();
    }
  }
  
  // Run immediately and also on DOM ready
  if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', tithiInitialize);
  } else {
    // DOM already loaded, run immediately
    setTimeout(tithiInitialize, 100);
  }
  
  // Also run after a short delay to ensure everything is loaded
  window.addEventListener('load', function() {
    setTimeout(tithiInitialize, 200);
  });
})();
</script>
```
